Player History
Drafted in 33rd round, 514th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 4/12/2015.
Released by Houston on 4/27/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 5/11/2015 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/15/2015 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/19/2016 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Injured on 4/22/2016 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/2016 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/7/2016 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
Injured on 8/19/2016 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/26/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $1,130,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2017, off Lawrence Beard (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/19/2017, off Kevin Lumsden (CHI)...
